name: Twins (MikkoK)
description:
Twins is a short horror game in PS1 style that I developed in 3 hours for Friday Night Game Jam 38 where the theme was Nostalgia.

Sadly I couldn't get the game running on HTML5 without freezing for some reason so it's only downloadable.

Your goal is to escape the building, sadly I didn't have time to add any actual puzzles that the original PS1 horror games are known from.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move.

Credits:

Player model by murilo.kleine on Sketchfab

Wall texture by p0ss on OpenGameArt

Floor texture by Dakal on OpenGameArt
